column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The Location in the West Loop
column3: is completely devoid of customer service. I was charged twice for an online order. The Manager
column5: could not/would not assist me further. The only solution offered was to contact my bank. He could not find a record of my purchase
column6: but that surely did not keep them from taking my money
column7: nor offering a refund. Never again!!
